name: tsim3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1))
-| wi(w1, wi(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wi(w2, w1)))
-| wi(w1, wi(w2, w1))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical implication, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
